tool_description: Your one source for DNS related tools! dns, info, reverse ip, pagerank, portscan, port scan, lookup, records, whois, ipwhois, dnstools, web hosting, hosting, traceroute, dns report, dnsreport, ip location, ip location finder, spam, spam database, dnsbl, propagation, dns propagation checker, checker, china, chinese, firewall, great firewall, is my site down, is site down, site down, down, dns propagate
name: ViewDNS
title: ViewDNS

api_list.name: Whois
api_list.description: Displays owner/contact information for a domain name. Can also be used to determine if a domain name is registered or not.  This tool is not available to free API key users. Access is restricted to paid API keys only.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: the domain to perform a whois lookup on

api_list.name: Port Scanner
api_list.description: This web based port scanner will test whether common ports are open on a server. Useful in determining if a specific service (e.g. HTTP) is up or down on a specific server.   Ports scanned are: 21, 22, 23, 25, 80, 110, 139, 143, 445, 1433, 1521, 3306 and 3389

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: the host to perform the port scanner on (domain or IP address)

api_list.name: Traceroute
api_list.description: Determines the series of servers that data traverses from the ViewDNS server to the specified domain name or IP address.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: the domain or IP address to perform a traceroute on

api_list.name: DNS Record Lookup
api_list.description: View all configured DNS records (A, MX, CNAME etc.) for a specified domain name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: the domain name to lookup DNS records for

optional_parameters.name: recordtype
optional_parameters.description: the type of DNS record you wish to retrieve (default 'ANY')

api_list.name: Ping
api_list.description: Test how long a response from remote system takes to reach the ViewDNS server. Useful for detecting latency issues on network connections.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: the domain or IP address to perform a ping on

api_list.name: IP Location Finder
api_list.description: This tool will display geographic information about a supplied IP address including city, country, latitude, longitude and more.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: the ip address to find the location of

api_list.name: Chinese Firewall Test
api_list.description: Checks whether a site is blocked by the Great Firewall of China. This test checks across a number of servers from various locations in mainland China to determine if access to the site provided is possible from behind the Great Firewall of China.   This test checks for symptoms of DNS poisoning, one of the more common methods used by the Chinese government to block access to websites.

api_list.name: Spam Database Lookup
api_list.description: Find out if your mail server is listed in any spam databases.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: the IP address to test for spam blacklisting

api_list.name: Free Email Lookup
api_list.description: Find out if a domain name provides free email addresses. Search is performed on a custom made list of thousands of known free email hosts.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: the domain name to test for free email services

api_list.name: MAC Address Lookup
api_list.description: This tool will display the name of the company that manufactured a specific network device based on its MAC Address.

api_list.name: Abuse Contact Lookup
api_list.description: Used to find the abuse contact address for a domain name. This is where you would send complaints about spam originating from that domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: the domain name to find the abuse contact for

api_list.name: DNS Propagation Checker
api_list.description: Check whether recent changes to DNS entries have propagated to DNS servers all over the world. Useful in troubleshooting DNS issues that appear to be isolated to one geographic region. Provides a status report on DNS propagation globally.

api_list.name: Iran Firewall Test
api_list.description: Test if any website is accessible using the Internet in Iran in real-time.

api_list.name: Reverse DNS Lookup
api_list.description: Find the reverse DNS entry (PTR) for a given IP. This is generally the server or host name.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: the IP address to retrieve the reverse DNS record for
